results.text: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It does not dishonor others, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres.
results.reason: Describes the characteristics and actions of genuine love.
results.reflection: True love is selfless, enduring, and seeks the well-being of others.

results.text: My command is this: Love each other as I have loved you.
results.reason: Jesus' direct command to love one another.
results.reflection: We are called to love others sacrificially, just as Christ loved us.

results.text: Dear friends, let us love one another, for love comes from God. Everyone who loves has been born of God and knows God.
results.reason: Emphasizes that love originates from God and is a sign of knowing Him.
results.reflection: Love is a divine gift that connects us to God and to one another.

results.text: Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love. Make every effort to keep the unity of the Spirit through the bond of peace.
results.reason: Encourages humility, patience, and unity in love.
results.reflection: True love fosters harmony, understanding, and peace among believers.

results.text: Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.
results.reason: Highlights the power of love to forgive and reconcile.
results.reflection: Love has the ability to heal relationships and bring restoration.
